text: Imi vatendi! Musava munofungidzira zvakanyanya, zvirokwazvo kumwe kufungidzira chitadzo. Uye musatsvaga tsvaga nyaya dzevamwe, uye musanyeyana. Umwe wenyu angada here kudya nyama yeumwe wake akafa? Munozvivenga (nokudaro vengai kunyeyana). Ivai munotya Allah. Zvirokwazvo, Allah ndivo vanoregerera, uye vanotambira kukumbira ruregerero, uye vane tsitsi zhinji
